subtitles:
185770 188398 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.
188481 190441 If you wanna get 'em out of here.

192277 194946 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!
209294 211797 Security, we have a break-in. Get the...

220138 222932 I know who you are.
I know what you think...

223016 226853 If you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

229022 232191 They're highly contagious.
They've been given an inhibitor.

232275 235737 - Infected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

244412 247540 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

249584 253963 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
254047 255590 We'll get you out of here.

255673 260595 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
277946 280073 Get it off! Get it off!

283451 286329 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

295421 298633 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

1004296 1006757 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

1015474 1018060 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1046964 1049258 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1078746 1083250 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1085919 1090632 The man goes to leave and the barman
says "Oi! You can't leave that lying there."
1091008 1095012 He says "No, it's not a lion. It's a giraffe".
1105481 1107858 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1115073 1117910 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1123373 1127878 I was riding a package
from Farringdon to Shaftesbury Avenue
1127961 1129796 and a car cut across me.

1129880 1133217 Then I wake up today in hospital.
I wake up and I'm...

1159368 1164832 It started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1165707 1169878 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1170754 1173090 And then it wasn't on the TV anymore.

1173423 1177010 It was in the street outside.
It was coming through your windows.
1182182 1184518 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1187604 1189731 There was something in the blood.

1191608 1195445 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1203704 1205622 And that's when the exodus started.

1210627 1213880 there were reports of Infection
in Paris and New York.
1216633 1218802 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1222556 1225350 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1228020 1232066 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1232149 1236486 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1237988 1241074 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1241658 1245287 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1264056 1267893 Look, I have to find them.
They live in Deptford. I can walk it. OK?
1268352 1270896 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1285869 1289206 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1292542 1296213 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1300884 1303970 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together, OK?

1319027 1321905 If you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1486820 1490782 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1497122 1501627 parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1504171 1509510 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1510093 1512345 I remember my dad had all this cash,
1512721 1516058 even though cash was completely useless.

1517642 1520770 About 20,000 other people
had the same idea.
1526151 1528486 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1530822 1532616 I remember the ground was soft.

1535035 1538914 I looked down
and I was standing on all these people.
1539456 1543418 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1543501 1546963 Somewhere in the crowd
there were Infected. It spread fast.

1547631 1550968 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1552594 1555680 Climb over more people.
So I did that. I climbed.
1555764 1558141 And I got up on top of this kiosk.

1560435 1564147 Looking down, you couldn't tell which faces
were infected and which weren't.

1565315 1569277 Then I saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1583458 1588338 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1591258 1594010 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.

1594094 1597431 No, we'll all sleep in the same room.
It's safer.
1700116 1702118 Give me a drink of that, will ya?

1746830 1749333 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1750041 1752377 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1755713 1758258 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1796212 1798256 Do you have any clothes here?

1801342 1805013 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1805430 1808975 More Infected will be coming.
They always do.

1837545 1840757 How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1840840 1844594 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. It was on you.

1844677 1848806 I didn't know he was infected.
He knew. I could see it in his face.

1850225 1854271 If someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1854646 1859192 It might be your brother, your sister or
your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1859275 1863446 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1865573 1869285 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans, Jim?

1869619 1873456 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world or just fall in love and fuck?
1876834 1879546 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1938104 1941024 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1941107 1943943 Stop talking. It's a long way up.
1962211 1964213 Now I do need a break.

1984150 1988738 - Why didn't you say something before?
- I didn't think you'd give a shit.

1990990 1995119 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1997580 1999707 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1999791 2004671 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

2010468 2013471 Actually,
I did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2090673 2093509 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?
2093801 2096095 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2129837 2132757 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.
2147980 2150274 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2150358 2153278 Why don't you all sit down and...
2153361 2155863 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2156405 2158282 We've got Mum's crème de menthe.

2169961 2173047 - Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2173130 2175883 Nah, the good ones. It's a celebration.
2198739 2201826 I know it isn't much but, well, cheers.
2230521 2232607 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.

2233065 2236152 Same with the toilet.
The flush doesn't work.
2237737 2239739 You'll have to use the bucket.
2246829 2249040 Have to empty it each morning.

2249498 2252585 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2254837 2258007 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2271562 2273940 I'll take the living room. It's fine.

2310476 2313813 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.
2315356 2317858 Probably need us more than we need them.

2329495 2333541 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2334417 2338004 - Because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2342925 2345636 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2362319 2365281 You think I don't get it, but I do get it.

2367116 2370536 And I know I'd be dead already
if I hadn't met you.
2403194 2405237 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2405321 2409450 I thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2409784 2412203 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2429553 2433766 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.

2433849 2437853 Saw it on TV once,
but I can't make it work.

2453744 2456247 Jim, we're not going to be
able to stay here.

2465798 2469301 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2469385 2474056 Salvation is here.
The answer to Infection is here.
2474140 2477018 If you can hear this, you're not alone.

2477101 2481981 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2482064 2483857 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2487570 2492325 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2495619 2499081 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now it just repeats.

2499748 2502293 - It's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.
2502376 2504879 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2508841 2512261 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2519518 2525524 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2525608 2528736 - Look, I didn't...
- No, it's OK. It's the truth.
2528819 2531280 I can't leave the block if it's the two of us.

2531572 2534825 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2537286 2541373 If it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2541749 2544877 - It's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to Infection...

2544960 2549548 There is no answer!
It's already done all the damage it can!

2549632 2552551 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2552635 2556722 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2561060 2566982 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2570319 2574031 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2576325 2578410 So we have to try and get there.

2592549 2596303 Just so you know,
I don't take checks or credit cards.

2624873 2627793 - What do you think?
- It's the most direct route.

2627876 2633257 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2650733 2653235 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2654028 2657489 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2657573 2661869 So we're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars...
2661952 2664747 It's really fucking obviously a shit idea!
2700532 2703035 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2703118 2705621 Agreed. I think we'd better do this quick.
2709124 2711210 I've got the wheel. You're on the jack.

2725766 2728769 Do you hear that?
Hey, hey, do you hear that?

2761260 2765431 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2765514 2769435 Grab hold! One, two, three, lift!

2775315 2780446 - Don't look at them! Don't look!
- I can see them! They're coming!

2791415 2794334 - Get the tire on, Hannah!
- I'm trying.

2807848 2810309 - Get in the car!
- Come on!

2886802 2890389 Don't take anything
that needs to be cooked, OK?
2890472 2892307 I think you can eat that raw.

2899815 2903902 If I never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.

2920836 2924089 "Takes out the fire
but leaves in the warmth."
2979019 2981897 Either we do this now or we're walking.

3034449 3036868 Like going on holidays
with your aunt!

3135050 3137844 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.
3213920 3216548 I can, like, taste the vitamin C.
3217382 3220510 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3282197 3285450 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3285533 3289704 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3290956 3294793 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3299172 3302384 Um... that's what you were thinking.
3305762 3307639 I was thinking I was wrong.

3319401 3322988 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3325240 3328744 Well, she's got her dad
and he's got his daughter. So...

3331287 3334541 I was wrong when I said
staying alive is as good as it gets.
3338753 3340922 See, that's what I was thinking.

3358982 3362444 It's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3391056 3393725 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3410742 3414746 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3414829 3417665 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.
3421669 3424255 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3424339 3427926 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3428009 3430303 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3442857 3445568 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3446736 3450031 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3527442 3530278 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3585625 3589128 - Did I miss breakfast?
- You'll sleep through anything.
3590672 3594175 We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door!
3670376 3673045 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3675423 3677759 No fire crews to put it out.
3808723 3812351 I don't understand, Dad. Did they leave?

3812435 3815563 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No!

3822653 3826115 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3943858 3946736 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3946819 3949280 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
4015429 4018683 I repeat, one male, two female.

4083581 4088461 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
4088711 4090421 So you can all have a shower.
4091005 4093007 You look like you need one. Please.

4114028 4119241 It ain't funny. I got loads of cooking to do,
you fucking Doris!
4128501 4131379 She's lost her dad, Jim. That's how she is.

4143891 4147436 Oh, don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

4151482 4156237 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

4156320 4160241 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
4161408 4163869 I want her to be OK.
4165496 4167790 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
4167873 4170667 It was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4210875 4214169 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4214253 4219800 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4222970 4227141 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to Infection.

4231604 4236108 As I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4236317 4239320 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4239403 4242573 The fire drove hundreds of Infected
out of Manchester.
4242656 4244909 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4255753 4261050 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4265346 4268682 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4269600 4273145 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4277650 4282446 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4282529 4284907 The belly of the house. The heart.

4284990 4289870 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilization.
4292456 4294583 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4294875 4298629 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4298712 4302091 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4305052 4307763 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4332079 4336083 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4344967 4348053 The idea was to learn something
about Infection.
4371744 4374705 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4386675 4390763 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the Infected take to starve to death.
4431845 4434056 ♪ You'll have to wait and see ♪
4436809 4439353 ♪ We hope it's chips, it's chips ♪

4455494 4458872 Tinned ham, tinned peas,
tinned beans and...

4466797 4469133 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honor of our guests.
4469216 4472302 Absolutely. I was going to propose a toast
4472386 4474763 but this omelet will do just as well.

4491238 4494199 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?
4495242 4497911 I thought the salt might cover the taste, sir.
4505419 4507546 I don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4509339 4513343 I can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4516805 4519099 I saw those eggs,
I thought it was Christmas.

4519349 4522561 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.
4522644 4525480 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4525772 4528984 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4529860 4534239 - You don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.
4534323 4536534 If you look at the whole life of the planet,

4539411 4543624 you know, Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4544374 4546835 So if the infection wipes us all out,
4547836 4550130 that is a return to normality.

4554134 4557095 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.
4557179 4559640 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4563268 4567898 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4571276 4574196 This is what I've seen
in the four weeks since Infection.

4578283 4580994 Which is what I saw
in the four weeks before Infection,

4582996 4587000 As far back as I care to remember,
people killing people.

4588418 4592005 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4600514 4603433 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4606228 4609481 I don't want to eat.
I want to bury my dad.
4610607 4613026 He's one of the people you're talking about.
4617531 4619575 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4671585 4674671 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt!
4691605 4694024 I ain't never seen that in my life!

4716505 4721218 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this anymore.
4722552 4724763 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4726515 4731603 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4733230 4735399 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4742072 4745742 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4754000 4757212 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4757295 4760757 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4771143 4772727 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4776606 4778191 The rest of you, go with him.

4801673 4805719 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4805802 4807429 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4807512 4811558 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.
4820358 4822902 I killed... I killed a boy.

4834706 4838919 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4860524 4864111 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4865362 4868615 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4870283 4872035 What could I say to him?

4873286 4877666 We fight off the Infected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4879459 4882629 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4883338 4886424 I moved us from the blockade,
I set the radio broadcasting

4906987 4908655 - What is it?
- We have to go.

4908738 4911032 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4917163 4918790 We get in the car and we go!

4920458 4925046 No! You're not going to keep them here!
You've got to let them go!

4925171 4928466 You can't keep them here!
Stay where you are!
4928675 4931052 I'm not gonna let you keep them here!
4945025 4946985 I want to give you a chance.
4951197 4953324 But I can't let them go.

4982062 4984523 Smithers says
"Women and semen don't mix."

4984606 4987275 And Mr Burns says
"We all know what you think, Smithers."

4987359 4990279 And that was my favorite joke
in The Simpsons.

4990445 4994074 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4994157 4998578 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4998703 5001414 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

5002165 5007379 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane!

5008755 5012801 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
5014344 5017972 Just imagine, just think about it.
5018348 5020600 How could Infection cross the oceans?

5020809 5024646 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

5024979 5027899 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

5027982 5031110 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

5036449 5039994 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

5048670 5053049 "There is no Infection.
It's just people killing people." He's insane!

5099345 5102890 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

5103683 5108813 You see, I'm gonna have the black one.
And I'm gonna make her squirm.

5109022 5112942 Mitchell, I swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
5116696 5118740 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

5143848 5147018 Come on then,
you fucking pansies. Do me first.
5147352 5149855 No, Mitch. Mitch, just use the gat.

5149938 5152983 - So you're gonna stick me?
- Shoot 'em!

5155443 5158488 Is that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

5158571 5160490 - I'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

5160698 5163659 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

5173419 5177549 You stupid cunt! What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

5177632 5181803 - You wanna shoot me? I'll kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
5183096 5185932 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

5188309 5191521 - Jones, move it!
- I can see him! I can see him!

5201322 5203241 - Can you see him?
- Through there!
5218965 5222218 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5261215 5265094 The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5265178 5268723 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5268890 5271434 which she certainly has no use for.
5272769 5274270 You can't do it to Hannah.

5274354 5277982 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5292330 5294248 - It's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5294332 5298086 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5316646 5320525 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5322860 5326405 - Listen, right. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5326572 5330076 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5354267 5357020 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5380209 5384338 We're gonna eat these, Hannah, OK?
Come on. Eat these.
5384422 5386174 Are you trying to kill me?
5389135 5391387 I'm making you not care. OK?
5403733 5405818 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5411991 5414327 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5644682 5647101 It sounded like a Claymore to me.

5648060 5652023 All right, I'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5654775 5656902 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5670708 5672752 I think they're having an effect.

5688809 5691145 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5692271 5695107 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5695608 5697318 Is that the way it works?

5701113 5704950 I don't think they are coming back.
I think they've been killed.

5723928 5727056 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5727306 5730142 Don't worry. I feel fine. Really.

5752164 5757586 Oi! Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5765428 5768848 Don't just stand there,
you soppy cunt! Get after them!
5791579 5793831 What the fuck you gonna do now?

5821108 5824945 - Defend these stairs with your fucking life!
- Hannah!

6003457 6007252 I haven't got any bullets.
I haven't got any fucking bullets!

6071358 6076029 It's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, I'll get you out of here.

6076113 6080200 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
6080284 6082619 And we'll live happy ever after, eh?
6147392 6149394 That was longer than a heartbeat.
6163992 6167954 Listen. Listen. It's not all fucked.
6173377 6175880 We're gonna be OK. It's not all fucked.

6176463 6179258 - I've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
6187891 6191645 Hannah, it's OK! He's not infected.
6191728 6193856 But I thought he was biting you.
6193939 6196483 I was kissing her. Are you stoned?
6198777 6200654 We have to get out of here. Come on!
6299169 6302381 Come on, Jim, breathe! Fucking breathe!
6395265 6397434 You looked all right in this, you know.

6419498 6423043 - I can't hear anything!
- I told you, I heard it!
6478682 6481101 Do you think he saw us this time?
